item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I have a propane radiant heater (not the fire pit) which i will cart along to the site, it should help somewhat.

Wear comfortable Winter Clothes, hat, gloves, woll socks..etc since we really won't be moving around much

Current Weather prediction (as of Thuirsday): Saturday: Sunny, with a high near 42. Northwest wind between 5 and 12 mph. .

Bring your Pot Luck food and beveage of choice for the INDOOR Git Together soon after the event.

Location given out at the rapids..

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
They really do paddle faster if they hear Banjos and see PITCH FORKS...


 

PADDLE FASTER !

PADDLE FASTER !

 

THE FINISH LINE IS JUST PAST US!

If you can get by us you are lucky !

 

IF YOU FALL IN YOU WILL NEVER GET TO THE END..!!!!!

 

PADDLE FASTER!

The "Dam Buster Lady" 

is right behind you and will eat you alive if she catches you !!

 

 

 

--------------------------------------------------

Looks like there has been a lot of rain and nice snow to get those good river flow conditions for the racers and for us to watch the dunkings or sucesses.

Watch these kayakers and Canoeists either make the rapids Expertly or be torn to pieces loosing all of their cargo and many body parts.


There may be blood all the way up the finish line drawing sharks all the way up the river from the DEEP ocean to have us scream in delight at the feeding frenzy..

 

 

*ROBIN*  WILL BE RACING AGAINST "THE DAM BUSTER LADY" ...

    

<~~Watch the "DAM BUSTER LADY" balance the bucket of Kantucky

Fried Chicken on her canoe

or take it from her and eat some.

 

 

 

 

 

 

LETS CHEER ON THE RACERS, THIS IS A GOOD EVENT TO WATCH AND THE POT LUCK EVENT AFTER IS A GOOD SOCIAL EVENT TILL ITS WARM ENOUGH FOR US TO Actually KAYAK.

This Race only happens once per year and i think its worth our participation, besides it interesting..and the racers also enjoy the cheer.

 

 

 

<~THIS IS WHERE

WE WILL BE

 

 

 

<~ BODY PARTS

 

 

 

http://www.scanticspringsplash.org/

*New*

SCANTIC SPRING SPLASH
SPECTATOR space SHUTTLE

 

FREE spectator parking will be available at the staff parking lot of Fermi High School (corner of North Maple Street and Moody Road).  The free shuttle bus will provide spectators a worry free trip to and from the Powder Mill Barn on race day.  The bus will run from 11:30 am until about one half hour after the end of the race.

Come and enjoy the race, and don’t worry about finding a parking space at Powder Hollow.

 

Remember to bring a food item to help fill our canoe for the Enfield Food Shelf. 

This time of year only the brave will go in the water, and we are only just going to watch them and cheer the racers on... They will go in the water for us and give us a great show.
Scantic River Water Temp : COLD

 

The actual race starts about 11:30 to 12:00 pm and it takes a while to go the 5 miles, but with a good current and their paddle speed, its not long before some start to finish, while waiting its good to check out the area and just converse..so i will get there about 12 pm,

 

So closer to the date the event will be updated on weather, water conditions and if the event is canceled by the promoters. etc.

 

FINDING US at the Site: 

When on the bridge, look up stream at the rapids, (THE PICTURE ABOVE IS WHERE I WILL BE JUST TO THE RIGHT OF THE RAPIDS WEARING MY ORANGE HUNTING HAT)

The river racers will be paddling 

5 Miles with 1 mandatory Portage from Somersville, CT to Powder Hollow Barn in Hazardville. 3 Class II Rapids, including the popular finish area. Lots of spectators.

THAT WILL BE SOME OF US... SPECTATORS

 

Driving and parking directions DIRECTIONS i used for the last 3 years (but now i see they have shuttle busses also..Fermi Highschool check scantic splash for those details):

From Interstate 91 to Parking lot

Take Exit 47 East. Go eastbound 2.7 miles on RT-190 (Hazard Avenue) from Enfield to Hazardville.

At intersection of RT-190 and North/South Maple Street (RT 192)

~~> turn right (South) onto South Maple Street. (but if going to Fremi High sckool for the shuttle bus, take a left and go north on North Maple.)

 

 

Hope to see you there..
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look For me wearing my Orange Hunting Hat "RIVERSIDE" down by the actual rapids.
item.why: ~~~> Its INTERESTING TO WATCH and we will have our pot luck barbie-q after to enjoy the socialization at some nearby location (outside or Home) depending on weather, .

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: MARCH 26 --Watch the Frantic Scantic Yakers @ Rivr Race Course & CHEER EM ON
